name: Cherry Blossom Brawler
description:
Cherry Blossom Brawler is a Beat Em Up type of game about Akiko, which is a girl that landed on a weird planet, she needs to collect fuel by battling monsters in order to escape with her spaceship.

Juan Pablo Suárez - Visual Artist

Mariano Ramírez Benítez - Programmer

Arturo Vivaldo - Music Designer
